description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Train your brain! No matter how old you are, this game is fun for everyone! Challenge yourself and play against the computer. Try to reproduce as many patterns as possible!
